trans-unit.source: Here's a jsfiddle to test it out, and in particular it includes some jQuery that breaks if you modify the Object.prototype directly because of the property becoming enumerable. This should work fine with 3rd party libraries.

trans-unit.source: lodash users may enjoy lodash.contrib which has a couple methods that mitigate this problem.
trans-unit.target: lodash用户可能会喜欢lodash.contrib，它有几种方法可以缓解此问题。

trans-unit.source: Disclaimer #1 Turning strings into references is unnecessary meta-programming and probably best avoided. Don't lose track of your references to begin with. Read more from this answer to a similar question.
trans-unit.target: 免责声明＃1将字符串转换为引用是不必要的元编程，并且最好避免。首先，不要忘记您的参考。从这个类似问题的答案中了解更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Disclaimer #2 We are talking about millions of operations per millisecond here. It is very unlikely any of these would make much difference in most use cases. Choose whichever makes the most sense knowing the limitations of each. For me I would go with something like reduce out of convenience.
trans-unit.target: 免责声明2我们在这里谈论每毫秒的数百万次操作。在大多数用例中，所有这些都不太可能产生很大的变化。在了解每种限制的情况下选择最有意义的一种。对我来说，我会喜欢 reduce 便利性。

trans-unit.source: Following options were elaborated starting from this answer. Same tree for both :
trans-unit.target: 从这个答案开始阐述了以下选择。两者的同一个树：

trans-unit.source: Gets the value at any depth in a nested object based on the path described by the keys given. Keys may be given as an array or as a dot-separated string. Returns undefined if the path cannot be reached.
trans-unit.target: 根据给定键描述的路径获取嵌套对象中任意深度的值。键可以数组或点分隔的字符串形式给出。如果无法到达路径，则返回 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: I know this question is old, but I wanted to offer an extension by adding this to all objects. I know people tend to frown on using the Object prototype for extended object functionality, but I don't find anything easier than doing this. Plus, it's now allowed for with the Object.defineProperty method.
trans-unit.target: 我知道这个问题很旧，但是我想通过将其添加到所有对象中来提供扩展。我知道人们倾向于使用对象原型来扩展对象功能，但是我发现没有比这更容易的事情了。另外，现在允许使用Object.defineProperty方法。

trans-unit.source: Regarding the performance, there is no performance penalty for using try..catch block if the property is set. There is a performance impact if the property is unset.
trans-unit.target: 关于性能，如果设置了属性，则使用 try..catch 块不会降低性能。如果未设置该属性，则会对性能产生影响。

trans-unit.source: Since Babel 7.8.0, ES2020 is supported by default
trans-unit.target: 从Babel 7.8.0开始，默认情况下支持ES2020

trans-unit.source: So I came up with my own. The great thing about it is that you don't have to interpolate strings. You can actually return a chain-able <s>object</s> function and do some magical things with it. You can even call functions and get array indexes to check for deep objects
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">所以我想出了自己的。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">很棒的事情是您不必插值字符串。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">您实际上可以返回一个可链接的</font></font><s><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">对象</font></font></s><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">函数，并用它做一些神奇的事情。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">您甚至可以调用函数并获取数组索引来检查深层对象</font></font>

trans-unit.source: Stop searching when undefined
trans-unit.target: 未定义时停止搜索

trans-unit.source: Test for existence of nested JavaScript object key
trans-unit.target: 测试是否存在嵌套的JavaScript对象键

trans-unit.source: The optional chaining proposal reached Stage 3 on the ECMAScript committee process, this will allow you to safely access deeply nested properties, by using the token ?., the new optional chaining operator:
trans-unit.target: 在可选的链接提案达到第3阶段的ECMAScript委员会进程，这将让你安全地访问深层嵌套的属性，通过使用令牌 ?. ，新的可选链接运算符：

trans-unit.source: The ! keys.length || kicks out of the recursion so it doesn't run the function with no keys left to test. Tests:
trans-unit.target: 该 ! keys.length || 踢出递归，因此它不会在没有要测试的键的情况下运行该函数。测试：

trans-unit.source: The try/catch catches the cases for when any of the higher level objects such as test, test.level1, test.level1.level2 are not defined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义任何更高级别的对象（例如test，test.level1，test.level1.level2），则 try/catch 捕获情况。

trans-unit.source: The above code works fine for synchronous stuff. But how would you test something that is asynchronous like this ajax call? How do you test that? what if the response isn't json when it returns a 500 http error?
trans-unit.target: 上面的代码对于同步的东西来说效果很好。但你怎么测试像这个ajax调用这样的异步的东西?如果响应不是json,当它返回500个http错误时,该如何测试?

trans-unit.source: The above expression will produce undefined if obj, obj.level1, or obj.level1.method are null or undefined, otherwise it will call the function.
trans-unit.target: 如果 obj ， obj.level1 或 obj.level1.method 为 null 或 undefined ，则上面的表达式将产生 undefined ，否则将调用该函数。

trans-unit.source: The above function allows you to get the value of nested properties, otherwise will return undefined.
trans-unit.target: 上面的函数允许您获取嵌套属性的值，否则将返回 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: The answer given by CMS works fine with the following modification for null checks as well
trans-unit.target: CMS给出的答案在进行以下修改后也能正常运行,对于空校验也能正常运行

trans-unit.source: The function will return true if the object exists, false otherwise
trans-unit.target: 如果对象存在,该函数将返回true,否则为false。

trans-unit.source: The optional chaining proposal finally reached Stage 4 in the December 2019 meeting of the TC39 committee. This means this feature will be part of the ECMAScript 2020 Standard.
trans-unit.target: 可选的链接建议最终在TC39委员会的2019年12月会议上达到了第4阶段。这意味着此功能将成为ECMAScript 2020标准的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The proposal also allows you to handle method calls safely:
trans-unit.target: 该建议还可以安全地处理方法调用。

trans-unit.source: This works because the && operator returns the final operand it evaluated (and it short-circuits).
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">之所以起作用，是因为&&运算符返回它求值的最终操作数（并使其短路）。</font></font>

trans-unit.target: 要查看所有带有文档的代码和我尝试过的测试，可以检查我的github内容：https : //gist.github.com/vsambor/3df9ad75ff3de489bbcb7b8c60beebf4#file-javascriptgetnestedvalues-js

trans-unit.source: Usage:
trans-unit.target: Usage:

trans-unit.source: What is the best way to check for the existence of property in deeply nested objects?
trans-unit.target: 如何检查深嵌套对象是否存在属性的最好方法是什么?

trans-unit.source: With a similar test:
trans-unit.target: 有了类似的测试。

trans-unit.source: With the function below, you can do deeptest('l2[0].k',obj)
trans-unit.target: 使用下面的函数，您可以执行 deeptest('l2[0].k',obj)

trans-unit.source: You can also use tc39 optional chaining proposal together with babel 7 - tc39-proposal-optional-chaining
trans-unit.target: 您还可以将tc39可选链接建议与babel 7一起使用-tc39-proposal-optional-chaining

trans-unit.source: You can do this by using the recursive function. This will work even if you don't know all nested Object keys name.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用递归函数来实现。即使你不知道所有嵌套的对象键名,这个函数也能发挥作用。

trans-unit.source: You can either simply catch the exception, or make a function to test the existence of multiple levels, something like this:
trans-unit.target: 您可以简单地 catch 异常，也可以创建一个函数来测试是否存在多个级别，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: You can read an object property at any depth, if you handle the name like a string: 't.level1.level2.level3'.
trans-unit.target: 如果您像字符串那样处理名称，则可以在任何深度读取对象属性： 't.level1.level2.level3' 。

trans-unit.source: You have to do it step by step if you don't want a TypeError because if one of the members is null or undefined, and you try to access a member, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果不想使用 TypeError ，则必须逐步进行操作，因为如果其中一个成员为 null 或 undefined ，并且尝试访问一个成员，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: You probably wonder where all the promise & .then chains are... this could be blocking for all that you know... but using the same Proxy technique with promise you can actually test deeply nested complex path for it existence without ever writing a single function
trans-unit.target: 您可能想知道所有 .then 和.then链在哪里...这可能会阻塞您所知道的所有信息...但是使用具有Promise的相同代理技术，您实际上可以测试深层嵌套的复杂路径是否存在，而无需编写任何单功能

trans-unit.source: but I was wondering if there’s a better way.
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">但我想知道是否有更好的方法。</font></font>
